shortdesc.ph: Used to set the frequency of local screenshot uploads.
Used to configure the frequency of local screenshot uploads.

section.p: is used to configure the function type of the local screenshot upload module and the position of the video observer.

plentry.pd: Frequency of local screenshot uploads, in seconds. This value must be greater than 0. The default value is 0, which means the SDK does not take screenshots. Agora recommends setting it to 10 seconds, and you can adjust it based on your business needs.
Position of the video observer. See .

Type of function module:
CONTENT_INSPECT_TYPE_INVALID (0): (Default) This module has no actual function. Do not set to this value.
CONTENT_INSPECT_TYPE_SUPERVISE (2): Uploads local screenshots via Agora's self-developed extension. The SDK captures and uploads video streams in the channel.
CONTENT_INSPECT_TYPE_IMAGE_MODERATION (3): Uploads local screenshots via an extension from the Agora Extension Marketplace. The SDK uses a video moderation extension from the Agora Extension Marketplace to capture and upload video streams in the channel.

Time interval between video screenshots and uploads (in seconds). The value should be greater than 0. The default is 0, which means the SDK does not take screenshots. Agora recommends setting it to 10, but it can be adjusted according to your business needs.
Position of the video observer. See .
